name: @fasttrack360/volt-vanilla
description: CSS and Sass mixins for building Volt Design System
author: Karthik Rajendran <karthik97live@gmail.com>

scripts.build-css: rm -rf public && node-sass --include-path src/scss src/scss/volt.scss public/volt.css && postcss public/volt.css > public/volt.min.css && postcss public/volt.min.css --map --use autoprefixer css-mqpacker cssnano --replace
scripts.watch-css: rm -rf public && node-sass --watch src/scss/volt.scss -o public/ && postcss public/volt.css > public/volt.min.css && postcss public/volt.min.css --map --use autoprefixer css-mqpacker cssnano --replace
